about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Aetheris with the Original Soundtrack of the game.

Composed by Nicolas Gaborel, this mesmerizing collection of music captures the essence of the game and takes you on an ethereal journey. Experience iconic tracks from the game alongside exclusive remixes and extra pieces that expand the sonic universe of Aetheris. Elevate your gaming experience or simply enjoy the captivating melodies on their own. Let the Aetheris Original Soundtrack transport you to a realm of dreams and imagination.

name: AETHERIS Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 320 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1310 MB available space

short_description: Dive into the enchanting world of Aetheris with the original soundtrack composed by Nicolas Gaborel. This captivating collection captures the essence of the game, taking you on an ethereal journey. Explore iconic and exclusive tracks that expand the sonic universe of Aetheris.
